Frequently Asked Questions

Can OpenAria integrate with ServiceTitan to auto-schedule emergency calls?

Yes. OpenAria captures emergency details (leak location, water pressure, access points), immediately syncs to your ServiceTitan calendar, assigns available technicians based on GPS proximity, and notifies your dispatcher and field team via push notification.

How does OpenAria qualify emergency vs. routine plumbing calls?

OpenAria asks triage questions: flooding risk, gas line involvement, structural water damage. High-priority emergencies are routed to on-call technicians and bump routine jobs, while standard drain cleaning requests are scheduled for next available slots to maximize dispatcher efficiency.

Does OpenAria handle after-hours calls when your office is closed?

Completely. OpenAria answers 24/7, captures emergency details, creates jobs in Jobber automatically, alerts your on-call technician via text/push, and sends the customer confirmation—all while you sleep, recovering lost revenue from unanswered calls.
